xwikidoc.title: Java test: JVM and JIT
xwikidoc.content:
{{info}}**Question:** At the core, the **JVM** and the **JIT** are:
1. two compilers. 1. a runtime compiler and an interpretor, respectively. 1. a runtime interpretor and a compiler. 1. two interpretors. {{/info}}
